name: Transitional Aged Youth
description: Our Transition Age Youth Program focuses on building vocational and living skills so that our students develop independence, social skills, and agency. This program provides work readiness training, including soft skills classes, individualized independent living skill activities, enrichment classes, and socialization opportunities.
fullDescription: Our Transition Age Youth Program focuses on building vocational and living skills so that our students develop independence, social skills, and agency. This program provides work readiness training, including soft skills classes, individualized independent living skill activities, enrichment classes, and socialization opportunities.
whatTheyOffer: Our Transition Age Youth Program focuses on building vocational and living skills so that our students develop independence, social skills, and agency. This program provides work readiness training, including soft skills classes, individualized independent living skill activities, enrichment classes, and socialization opportunities.
howToGetIt: To enroll in the Transitional Aged Youth program contact: Victor Ha vha@prrcsf.org
